name: Grand Prison Escape 3D
description:
Can you make a successful prison breakout plan in this game? Spending life is a prison is a hard time, especially if you have been convicted of something you have never done. In this prison game you (a former law enforcement agent) has been put inside prison.

You have ended up in the prison due to a conspiracy. Find a way out of this prison. The only way to save yourself is to breakout the prison from inside by make a prison escape plan. The objective is to make an escape plan.

Grand Prison Escape 3D

This game is for all those who like prison escape simulators, prison breakouts, or jail games. You are presented with a number of challenging and exiting levels.

Surrounded with criminals you can’t trust, and police guards at the watch towers and gates, you must make a secure escape plan my making inmate friends, finding keys and/or other useful equipment, and by exploring the underground tunnels and pipes. This prison simulator game is not an easy one. Test your planning skills in this lockdown jail breakout. There are cops and security guards patrolling.

Use all the available resources keeping your stealth mode on to make a successful prison breakout plan. The jail criminals are dangerous, but you need to survive and get yourself out of this place. This prison escape is one of the coolest jail game. We hope you enjoy every bit of this prison game.

Features:
- Excellent mobile controller
- Realistic action missions
- Detailed prison environment
- Inventory systems to keep keys, tools
- Challenging gameplay

Don’t forget to write a review, have a great time playing this prison simulator game.
